text:
e="preserve">Bella Emberg (born Sybil Dyke; 16 September 1937 – 12 January 2018) was a British comedy actress whose career lasted for 60 years. She was born in Brighton, Sussex. She was known for her roles in "The Benny Hill Show", "Softly, Softly", "Z Cars", as well as having small roles in "Grange Hill" and in "The Russ Abbot Show", where she played superheroine Blunderwoman.
Emberg died on the Isle of Wight on 12 January 2018, aged 80.
